name: Snail Watch
description:
Snail Watch Game - Save snails from falling into the ditches.

Your goal is to save snails from falling in the ditches. You can help one snail at a time and multiple snails would puzzle you enough to keep you thinking where to be. They will fall down in the ditches if not helped cross-over. You have a maximum of '3 misses'.

To save the snails from falling down, tap on the screen to place the bridge at desired location. Screen is virtually divided into four tap zones for easy play.
